entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is introduced as Uncle Vernon's son and Harry's cousin. He is described as a layabout wizard.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as a wizard who is part of the Order people. He is described as shouting at Uncle Vernon.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is introduced as Dudley's father and Harry's uncle. He is described as being frustrated with Harry and the Order people.

entities.name: the order people
entities.description: The Order people are introduced as a group that Harry is part of. They are described as helping Dudley and his parents.

relationships.description: Harry helps Dudley by convincing him to accept the Order's help.
Uncle Vernon opposes the Order people and is frustrated with Harry for being part of them.
Dudley listens to Harry and decides to accept the Order's help.
The Order people help Dudley's parents by protecting them from the Death Eaters.
